com.interpss.core.sparse.impl

Class SparseEqnDoubleImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.interpss.core.sparse.impl.AbstractSparseEquation
      • com.interpss.core.sparse.impl.SparseEqnDoubleImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISparseEquation, ISparseEqnDouble
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SparseEqnMatrix2x2Impl

    public class SparseEqnDoubleImpl
extends AbstractSparseEquation
implements ISparseEqnDouble
    Sparse Equation of data type double for solving the [A]X=B problem. To outside, the index number is from 0 to n-1. When [A] is a square matrix, LU decomposition method is used to solve the eqn When [A] is a non-square matrix, QR decomposition method is used to provide a Least Square or Weighted Least Square solution
